author: Inside Story
title: Is Thailand on the path to fresh political turmoil? | Politics | Al Jazeera
text:
Constitutional Court removes prime minister and dissolves opposition party.
Read more Thailand‚Äôs democracy has entered another phase.
In the past week, the Constitutional Court has dismissed the prime minister and ordered the dissolution of the main opposition party, which won last year‚Äôs election.
Keep reading list of 3 items list 1 of 3 Thailand‚Äôs disbanded opposition party relaunches under new name, leader

author: Joshua Ramos
title: Eyeing a 20% Surge to End 2023?
text: The digital asset market has undoubtedly witnessed a bullish surge over the last day. Moreover, it could be set to benefit Cardano (ADA), as one crypto analyst sees the asset eyeing a 20% surge to the end of 2023. Subsequently, the asset would be heading into the new year with renewed momentum. Earlier this week, Cardano was faced with an unexpected drop in value. Indeed, the token saw its price correct and fall to lows of $0.56 on Tuesday. However, it could be set to make a turnaround sooner rather than later. Indeed, the asset is forecasted to enter 2024 on the heels of quite a rally. Also Read: [Cardano (ADA) Rallies 77%, Hits Yearly High: Can It Hit $1 Next?](https://watcher.guru/news/cardano-ada-rallies-77-hits-yearly-high-can-it-hit-1-next) Cardano (ADA) Could Make Surge to $0.7 As 2024 Arrives The year has certainly been a positive one for the digital asset industry. 2022 ended with collapse and struggles, with 2023 set to end amid tremendous optimism over the health of the market. One asset that has seen increased volatility throughout the week could also benefit from similar optimism. Specifically, one analyst has stated that Cardano (ADA) could be facing a 20% surge by the end of 2023. Indeed, [Ali Martinez](https://x.com/ali_charts/status/1740004785217282178?s=20) took to X (formerly Twitter) to discuss what could be next for the asset. Especially after its rather shocking price correction this week saw it fall in value. Also Read: [Cardano ADA: Is $1 The Next Milestone?](https://watcher.guru/news/cardano-ada-is-1-the-next-milestone) Specifically, Martinez made note of Cardano‚Äôs readings on the four-hour chart. He made note of a symmetrical triangle that was shaping up, which would prepare the asset for a rather stark turn upward. Subsequently, he forecast a lift to the $0.78 price point after a noticeable breakout. Over the last 24 hours, Cardano had increased its price by more than 7%, to trade around the $0.65 level. Moreover, it sported intraday highs of $0.678, after retreating just a bit. Still, the development does paint an optimistic picture following its recovery from Tuesday‚Äôs decline. Further solidifying the potential validity of Martinez‚Äôs prediction.

title: Alerta naranja en CDMX y heladas en todo M√©xico; el clima del viernes 3 de enero
text:

El viernes 3 de enero de 2025, M√©xico enfrentar√° una jornada marcada por un frente fr√≠o que traer√° bajas temperaturas a gran parte del pa√≠s, por eso te contamos cu√°l ser√° el clima en las diferentes ciudades.
Mientras el norte y centro del territorio reportar√°n heladas y temperaturas cercanas a los 0¬∫; en el sur y sureste predominar√°n lluvias moderadas a intensas debido al ingreso de humedad proveniente del Golfo de M√©xico y el Oc√©ano Pac√≠fico .

Se activa alerta naranja en la Ciudad de M√©xico En la Ciudad de M√©xico , la Secretar√≠a de Gesti√≥n Integral de Riesgos y Protecci√≥n Civil (SGIRPC) activ√≥ Alerta Naranja para las zonas altas de las alcald√≠as Cuajimalpa, Milpa Alta y Tlalpan , donde se esperan temperaturas de entre 1 y 3¬∫ entre la medianoche y las 08:00 horas (tiempo local).
Por su parte, las alcald√≠as √Ålvaro Obreg√≥n , Coyoac√°n , Magdalena Contreras , Miguel Hidalgo , Tl√°huac y Xochimilco estar√°n bajo Alerta Amarilla, con temperaturas previstas de entre 4 y 6¬∫ en el mismo horario.
Diferentes temperaturas en M√©xico Efectos pronosticados para el viernes 3 de enero:
Lluvias muy fuertes : Veracruz, Oaxaca, Chiapas y Tabasco. Chubascos fuertes : Tamaulipas, San Luis Potos√≠, Puebla y Quintana Roo. Lluvias aisladas : Coahuila, Nuevo Le√≥n, Michoac√°n, Guerrero, Estado de M√©xico y Ciudad de M√©xico. Temperaturas extremas : M√≠nimas de -15 a -10 ¬∞C en zonas monta√±osas de Durango; m√°ximas de 35 a 40 ¬∞C en Sinaloa, Michoac√°n y Guerrero. Tambi√©n te puede interesar: Navidad: Momento exacto en el que llega el clima fr√≠o a Yucat√°n, Campeche y Quintana Roo
El clima fr√≠o se aproxima al sureste mexicano antes de la temporada de Navidad, provocando un cambio en las temperaturas de Campeche, Yucat√°n y Quintana Roo.
M√©xico Ver nota
Recomendaciones para el intenso fr√≠o en M√©xico Debido a las bajas temperaturas, las autoridades emitieron las siguientes recomendaciones :
Vestimenta adecuada : utilizar al menos tres capas de ropa, preferentemente de algod√≥n o lana, as√≠ como cubrir extremidades y rostro para evitar el impacto directo del fr√≠o. Hidrataci√≥n y alimentaci√≥n : consumir abundante agua y alimentos ricos en vitaminas A y C para reforzar las defensas. Evitar cambios bruscos de temperatura : protegerse de corrientes de aire y buscar refugios c√°lidos en caso de encontrarse al aire libre. Prevenci√≥n en el hogar : mantener ventilaci√≥n adecuada al usar calentadores o chimeneas para prevenir intoxicaciones por mon√≥xido de carbono. Adem√°s, la dependencia aconseja lavarse las manos con frecuenci a o usar gel antibacterial, ya que las enfermedades respiratoria s suelen incrementarse en esta temporada . Si se presentan s√≠ntomas de malestar, se debe acudir de inmediato a un centro de salud.
